basics.name: Francisco Cerdas Ureña
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: I'm a experienced developer, operating on the entire software life cycle, from conception to a product release working with multiples programming languages. Currently, in love with NodeJS and all the Javascript World (FrontEnd with React.js & BackEnd). I like exploring other languages and approaches, so, I spend some time playing with Go, Python, Arduino and Elixir/Erlang. I like the collaborative environments, test driven development, teamwork and modern software patterns. You can check my Github profile where you can find my personal projects.

work.summary: SOIN its an IT company with national prestige, it also has offices in other countries like Spain, Mexico, El Salvador due to its excellent technological solutions.

positions.title: Software Developer
positions.summary: I'm currently working as part of web development team that is building several apps for government institutions in Costa Rica, just like Dirección General de Migración y Extranjería, Servicio Fitosanitario del Estado and Crearempresa.go.cr.

positions.title: Software Developer - Fan-Fam App
positions.summary: Fan-Fam it's a app for music bands suscriptions, where the fans can buy music and merchandise of bands. Work in progress, not released yet.

positions.title: Software Developer / Web Engineer Lead - TSA App
positions.summary: TSA is the acronym of Registration of Early Summary Transmission and risk management. TSA is a web application for customs risk management base in the data model of the WCO (Worl Customs Organization).

positions.title: Software Developer - React Form Converter
positions.summary: It's a simple tool to convert simple HTML form to React Forms

positions.title: Software Developer / Web Engineer Lead - Tapp App
positions.summary: TAPP is an app where you have all your favorite frequent customer cards. You earn points for your purchases and you can redeem them for prizes or use them as redeemable money to buy products in stores. The biggest loyalty service in Costa Rica with thousands of daily users.

positions.title: Software Developer / Web Engineer Lead - Digital Rx
positions.summary: It's a platform used by the Costa Rica Health Ministry to manage and control the prescription, marketing and dispatch of psychotropic and narcotic drugs. Digital Rx allows to integrate the information that is generated as a result of these processes, which allows to Health Ministry to carry out an adequate administration of psychotropic and narcotic drugs in our country.
highlights: Work directly with the product owner to establish milestones and deadlines of the developments

positions.title: Software Developer - Quecomemos App
positions.summary: Quecomemos was the first app for order food from principal food chains in Costa Rica. Used by thousands of users, was the biggest food delivery app.
highlights: Part of the architectural designer of the app

positions.title: Software Developer - ERP Software
positions.summary: Enterprise Resource Planning Web Application used by Televisa, Bimbo, P.M.I PEMEX and goverment institutions in Costa Rica.

references.name: Heriberto Ureña (burenam17@gmail.com) - coworkers at SOIN
references.reference: It's my pleasure to recommend Francisco, we work together at SOIN and he proved that he will be a valuable professional to any company as web developer.

references.name: Tomás González Castetbon - coworkers at SOIN
references.reference: I have worked with Francisco in several projects in the same company and I can say his seniority is highly-felt; one of the most committed & responsible person/teammate I have had the pleasure to work with. When it comes down to reviews/plannings, Francisco's input and ideas always tend to shine and are highly taken in consideration for the projects on focus.
